p: The acquisition parameters for the HSQC experiments (Bruker sequence “hsqcedetgpsp.3”) were as follows: time domain, 2 K in the acquisition or direct HSQC dimension F2 ( 1H) and 256 in indirect HSQC dimension F1 ( 13C); dummy scans, 16; number of scans, 8; acquisition time, 0.156 s, delay time, 2 s; spectral width, 11 ppm (6602 Hz) in F2 ( 1H) and 210 ppm (31693 Hz in F1) ( 13C); fid resolution, 6.45 Hz (F2) 247.60 Hz (F1); digitization mode, baseopt. J-coupling for one-bond correlation selection 1J (XH) 145 Hz. Total acquisition time was 1 h and 15 min.
